title: Deadly Intent
description: In this Dateline classic, a car bomb explodes in front of a suburban San Diego day care home. Josh Mankiewicz reports on the driver, a married mother of three children. Originally aired on NBC on October 4, 2013.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
